org.aludratest.service
Interface Action

All Known Subinterfaces:
Condition, DatabaseCondition, DatabaseInteraction, DatabaseVerification, EdifactFileCondition, EdifactFileInteraction, EdifactFileVerification, FileCondition, FileInteraction, FileVerification, FlatFileCondition, FlatFileInteraction, FlatFileVerification, GUICondition, GUIInteraction, GUIVerification, Interaction, JMSCondition, JMSInteraction, JMSVerification, SeparatedFileCondition, SeparatedFileInteraction, SeparatedFileVerification, Verification, WebGUICondition, WebGUIInteraction, WebGUIVerification
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSelenium2Action, AbstractSeleniumAction, DefaultFlatFileAction, DefaultSeparatedFileAction, EdifattoFileAction, FileActionImpl, JMSActionImpl, Selenium1Condition, Selenium1Interaction, Selenium1Verification, Selenium2Condition, Selenium2Interaction, Selenium2Verification
public interface Action

Parent interface for all service actions which can provide file-based information useful for debugging.

Author:
Joerg Langnickel, Volker Bergmann

Method Summary
 List<Attachment> createAttachments(Object object, String title)
          Creates zero, one or more attachments which represent the provided object.
 List<Attachment> createDebugAttachments()
          Creates attachments containing whichever information the service finds helpful for debugging the current state.
 void setSystemConnector(SystemConnector systemConnector)

Method Detail

createDebugAttachments

List<Attachment> createDebugAttachments()
Creates attachments containing whichever information the service finds helpful for debugging the current state.

Returns:
a list of Attachments which contains the debugging information

createAttachments

List<Attachment> createAttachments(Object object,
                                   String title)
Creates zero, one or more attachments which represent the provided object.

Parameters:
object - the object to save
title - the title to use for the object
Returns:
a list of Attachments or null

setSystemConnector

void setSystemConnector(SystemConnector systemConnector)
Injects a SystemConnector

Parameters:
systemConnector - the SystemConnector to use
